attributes.action: Each premiere leauge team should have at least 5 english players in there starting line up
attributes.additional_details: In the community shield on the 10th of August 2014 Arsenal played Manchester City at Wembley. There wasn't a single English player in the Manchester City starting line up and Arsenal only had 3. When the national anthem was played not a single player sang. The Premier league is ruining the English national team!

rejection.details: A matter for the Football Association.
